typeDescription: Analytics that demonstrate if jobs have used the resources that they requested.

analytics.description: Ratio of idle core cycles to total cycles
analytics.title: CPU Usage
statisticLabels: Average CPU % Idle: Weighted by Core Hour

analytics.description: Measure of overall average GPU Usage for a GPU job
analytics.title: GPU Usage
statisticLabels: Average % GPU Usage: Weighted by Node Hours

analytics.description: Measure of the memory allocated for the job to the high-water mark memory usage
analytics.title: Memory Headroom
statisticLabels: Average CPU % Idle: Weighted by Core Hore

analytics.description: A measure of how uniform the L1D load rate is over the lifetime of the job.
analytics.title: Homogeneity
statisticLabels: Average CPU % Idle: Weighted by Core Hore

typeDescription: Analytics that demonstrate if a resource is being used as it is designed.

analytics.description: Ratio of wall time used to wall time allocated
analytics.title: Wall Time Accuracy

analytics.description: Count of all jobs that were running for less than a threshold (30s)
analytics.title: Short Job Count
statisticLabels: Average CPU % Idle: Weighted by Core Hore
